test_message: Create a 6-slide professional presentation on 'Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025'. Target audience: C-suite executives. Key points: AI adoption, cloud migration, cybersecurity, ROI metrics. Style: Professional.

raw_response.raw_text:
Your professional 6-slide PowerPoint presentation titled "Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025"—tailored for C-suite executives and covering AI adoption, cloud migration, cybersecurity, and ROI metrics—has been created.

You can download the complete presentation here:
[Download Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025 (PPTX)](https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/0cd23cc7)

If you need changes or want to review the detailed slide content, just let me know!

field_types.raw_text: string - Contains the full agent text response with markdown-formatted download link
field_types.download_link_markdown: string - Full markdown link: [Download Digital Transformation Strategy for 2025 (PPTX)](https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/0cd23cc7)

ui_mapping_hints.primary_display: raw_text - Render as markdown to make the download link clickable
ui_mapping_hints.download_button_url: Extract URL from raw_text using regex pattern
suggested_ui_components: Markdown renderer for the response text
Dedicated download button linking to the extracted URL
File icon indicator showing PPTX file type

notes: This is a FILE OUTPUT agent. The response comes back as plain text (not structured JSON with status/result/metadata). The raw_text contains a markdown-formatted download link to a shortened URL (https://url-shortner.studio.lyzr.ai/0cd23cc7) that points to the generated PPTX file. The UI should: (1) render the text as markdown so the link is clickable, OR (2) parse out the URL and render a dedicated download button. There is NO module_outputs array in the actual response - the file URL is embedded in the text response itself.
